health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Amriya Juma, Hon. Athman Rama Mwamwiri, Hon. Fadhili Makarani, Hon. Milka Moraa, Hon. Rama Athman, Hon. Juma Manuari, Hon. Hamisi Mbaya, Hon. Juma Kambi, Hon. Mulu Mwakamuludonda, Hon. Munee Allen Katana, Hon. Ahmed Khamis, Hon. Leila, Hon. Chief Whip (Hon. Mumba)
health_data_challenges: Lack of coordination between various actors in the development arena leading to duplication, waste of resources, and stalling of projects.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: 1. County government to provide strategic coordination leadership solutions and development at the Ward level aligned to section 106 of the County Government Act, 2012. 2. County government to facilitate Ward-level concrete action between County Government, international organizations, civil society, and the private sector to achieve sustainable development.
health_sector_decisions: Approval of the Mombasa County Assembly Calendar, 2022
health_evidence_base: Section 106 of the County Government Act, 2012, and discussions around the Mombasa County Ward Development Coordination Framework.
